data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Meizhou. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Meizhou, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Meizhou, Guangdong, China into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 153,065 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,864,635 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Meizhou to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Meizhou, Guangdong, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Meizhou, Guangdong, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.section_summary:
the county of Meizhou, Guangdong, China has a population of 2,017,700.

We estimate Meizhou has 153,065 people who might know Jesus, 32,596 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,832,039 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, provide a Bible for every believer in Meizhou, Guangdong, China, and teach them to obey it.
data.verse: For if you listen to the word and don’t obey, it is like glancing at your face in a mirror. 24 you see yourself, walk away, and forget what you look like. 25 But if you look carefully into the perfect law that sets you free, and if you do what it says and don’t forget what you heard, then God will bless you for doing it.
